snippet: The U.S. thwarts the rise of a Mexican general; King Richard III is found at last; Suzy Menkes on the new head of the British Fashion Council; and match-fixing makes waves in global soccer.
abstract: The U.S. thwarts the rise of a Mexican general; King Richard III is found at last; Suzy Menkes on the new head of the British Fashion Council; and match-fixing makes waves in global soccer.
